scripts.start: npm run css-deploy && npm run js-deploy
scripts.deploy: npm run css-deploy-prod && npm run js-deploy-prod
scripts.css-deploy: npm run css-build && npm run css-postcss
scripts.css-deploy-prod: npm run css-build && npm run css-postcss-prod
scripts.js-deploy: npm run js-build && npm run js-uglify
scripts.js-deploy-prod: npm run js-build && npm run js-uglify-prod
scripts.js-build: cat src/WebShell/templates/js/*.js > src/WebShell/static/js/rmrf.js && cp node_modules/mithril/mithril.min.js node_modules/mithril/mithril.js src/WebShell/static/js/
